title: Antelope Island State Park
description: A scenic island in the Great Salt Lake offering hiking, wildlife viewing, and stunning sunsets.

title: Hill Aerospace Museum
description: Explore historic aircraft and learn about the Air Force's legacy through interactive exhibits.

title: Layton Commons Park
description: A central park with walking paths, playgrounds, and seasonal events.

title: Adams Canyon Trail
description: A popular hiking trail leading to a waterfall, offering scenic views and a moderate challenge.

title: Great Salt Lake Shorelands Preserve
description: Wetlands preserve with boardwalks and birdwatching opportunities.

title: Surf 'n Swim
description: Indoor wave pool and aquatic center for family fun and fitness.

title: Ellison Park
description: Sports fields, splash pad, and playgrounds in a spacious park setting.

title: The Hive Winery
address: 1220 W Heritage Park Blvd, Layton, UT 84041
description: Local winery offering tastings of fruit wines and meads.
